content:
write_file({'path': 'app/frontend/index.html', 'content': ' VoyageX Travel
'})

write_file({'path': 'app/frontend/package.json', 'content': '{
  "name": "voyagex-frontend",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "private": true,
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "vite",
    "build": "vite build",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "lint": "eslint src --ext js,jsx --max-warnings=0"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@radix-ui/react-checkbox": "^1.0.4",
    "@radix-ui/react-dropdown-menu": "^2.0.6",
    "@radix-ui/react-select": "^2.0.0",
    "@radix-ui/react-tabs": "^1.0.4",
    "axios": "^1.6.2",
    "clsx": "^2.1.0",
    "lucide-react": "^0.441.0",
    "react": "^18.2.0",
    "react-dom": "^18.2.0",
    "react-router-dom": "^6.22.3"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@vitejs/plugin-react": "^4.0.0",
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.16",
    "eslint": "^8.57.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^4.6.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react-refresh": "^0.4.5",
    "postcss": "^8.4.35",
    "tailwindcss": "^3.4.1",
    "vite": "^5.0.0"
  }
}
'})

write_file({'path': 'app/frontend/Dockerfile', 'content': 'FROM node:20-alpine AS build
WORKDIR /app
COPY package.json package-lock.json* ./
RUN npm install
COPY . .
RUN npm run build

FROM nginx:alpine
COPY --from=build /app/dist /usr/share/nginx/html
EXPOSE 80
CMD ["nginx", "-g", "daemon off;"]
'})

write_file({'path': 'app/frontend/src/components/layout/Header.jsx', 'content': 'import React from 'react'; import { Link, NavLink, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Plane, BedDouble, Car, Package, User, Menu } from 'lucide-react'; import * as DropdownMenu from '@radix-ui/react-dropdown-menu'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext.jsx'; const navTabs = [ { to: '/stays', label: 'Stays', icon: BedDouble }, { to: '/flights', label: 'Flights', icon: Plane }, { to: '/cars', label: 'Cars', icon: Car }, { to: '/packages', label: 'Packages', icon: Package }, ]; export function Header() { const { user, logout } = useAuth(); const location = useLocation(); return (
VoyageX
{navTabs.map((tab) => { const Icon = tab.icon; return ( `inline-flex items-center gap-1.5 rounded-full px-3 py-1.5 transition-colors ${ isActive || location.pathname.startsWith(tab.to) ? 'bg-primary text-white' : 'text-textSecondary hover:bg-slate-100' }` } > {tab.label} ); })}
Trips {user ? ( <> Signed in as
{user.email}
 Profile Trips Cart logout()} className="cursor-pointer rounded-md px-2 py-1.5 text-danger outline-none hover:bg-red-50" > Sign out ) : ( <> Sign in Create account )}
); } export default Header; '})

write_file({'path': 'app/frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.jsx', 'content': 'import React from 'react'; export function Footer() { return (
VoyageX

VoyageX is a demo travel booking experience inspired by Expedia, built for modern web architectures.

Support Privacy Terms

\x00a9 {new Date().getFullYear()} VoyageX. All product names, logos, and brands are property of their respective owners.

); } export default Footer; '})

write_file({'path': 'app/frontend/src/components/auth/SocialProofStrip.jsx', 'content': 'import React from 'react'; import { ShieldCheck, Star, Globe2 } from 'lucide-react'; export function SocialProofStrip() { return (
Trusted bookings

Secure payments and protected trips with every booking.

Top-rated stays

Browse thousands of verified reviews from real travelers.

Global coverage

); } export default SocialProofStrip; '})
